container.heading: Maryland Occupational Safety and Health Regulations .01—.09
container.text: Note: Documents incorporated by reference by MOSH will continue to be cited under COMAR 09.12.31. A list of these documents follows.

para.text: In General.
All provisions of 29 CFR §§1910 and 1926 that appear in the Federal Register through February 2, 1973 are adopted by reference. Effective date: March 7, 1973
All amendments and revisions to 29 CFR §§1910 and 29 CFR 1926 that appear in the Federal Register from February 8, 1973 through December 4, 1973 are adopted by reference. Effective date: May 23, 1974
